name: Space Destroyers
description:
You play as one of the elite pilots fighting for peace in space. However, it is not an easy task. In space teeming with strangers who want to take over the entire universe.

This is a demo / showcase of my upcoming game.

Plans are to:

- allow upgrades (health/shield/firepower)

- change ship model

- explore new solar systems with new enemies

Demo will be available also on Google Play Store (it's in review now)
